text: The Chicago Temple Building is a 173-meter (568 foot) tall skyscraper church located at 77 W. Washington St. in Chicago, Illinois, United States. It is home of the First United Methodist Church of Chicago. It was completed in 1924 and has 23 floors dedicated to religious and office use. It is the tallest church building in the world, although Ulm Minster is the tallest church in the world. ==Other websites== *Emporis: Chicago Temple Building *SkyscraperPage *First United Methodist Church Category:Methodism Category:Cathedrals in the United States Category:Churches in Chicago Category:1924 establishments in the United States Category:1920s establishments in Illinois
title: Chicago Temple Building
